scaleSSD.models¶

scaleSSD.models.bbox_mapper¶

class scaleSSD.models.bbox_mapper.BboxDecoder(all_anchor_boxes, input_shape, conf_thres=0.3, max_num=300)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

This class is responsible for decoding the output of the Custom SSD model into bounding boxes. This class is a nn.Module and can be appended to the Custom SSD model.

Parameters

  • all_anchor_boxes (numpy array) – array containing all the anchor boxes coordinates

  • input_shape (tuple[int, int]) – the image shape expected by the model

  • conf_thres (float, optional) – the minimum confidence threshold that decided whether to keep or drop the box, defaults to 0.3

  • max_num (int, optional) – maximum number of boxes to keep, defaults to 300

decalc_offsets(offset_annos, anchors)¶

De-calculates dimension offsets of annotations, based on their reference anchors

Parameters

  • offset_annos (torch.Tensor) – the offseted annotations

  • anchors (torch.Tensor) – the anchors to use

Returns

array containing de-offseted annotations

Return type

torch.Tensor

forward(x)¶

Forward function for the BboxDecoder layer

Parameters

x (tuple(torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor)) – tuple of torch Tensors, containing the output data of the Custom SSD model

Returns

tuple containing Custom SSD output data as well as the decoded boxes, scores and classes

Return type

tuple(torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor, list, list, list)

training: bool¶
class scaleSSD.models.bbox_mapper.BboxEncoder(all_anchor_boxes, input_shape, fmap_sizes, anchors, no_classes)¶

Bases: object

This class is responsible for encoding the annotation boxes into the format expected by the Custom SSD model

Parameters

  • all_anchor_boxes (numpy array) – array containing all the anchor boxes coordinates

  • input_shape (tuple[int, int]) – the image shape expected by the model

  • fmap_sizes (list[tuple[int,int]..]) – a list of tuples containing the sizes of feature map outputs of the model

  • anchors (list[numpy.array...]) – list containing the anchors per feature map output

  • no_classes (int) – the number of classes outputed by the model

calc_offsets(annos, anchors)¶

Calculates dimension offsets of annotations based on anchors

Parameters

  • annos (numpy.array) – the annotations to offset

  • anchors (numpy.array) – the anchors to use

Returns

array containing offseted annotations

Return type

numpy.array

encode_annos(annos, classes, min_thres=0.2, max_thres=0.4)¶

Encodes annotations on fixed-dimension array expected by the model

Parameters

  • annos (numpy.array) – the annotations to encode

  • classes (numpy.array) – the annotation classes to encode

  • min_thres (float, optional) – the minimum accepted iou_threshold for assignment, defaults to 0.4

  • max_thres (float, optional) – the maximum accepted iou_threshold for assignment, defaults to 0.7

Returns

tuple of encoded classification and bounding box offset tensors

Return type

tuple[torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor]

class scaleSSD.models.bbox_mapper.BboxNMS(nms_thres=0.3)¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

This class is responsible for applying NMS to the outputs of the BboxDecoder layer. This class is a nn.Module and can be appended to the Custom SSD model, after BboxDecoder layer.

Parameters

nms_thres (float, optional) – nms threshold to use, defaults to 0.3

forward(x)¶

Forward function for the BboxNMS layer

Parameters

x (tuple(torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor, list, list, list)) – tuple containing Custom SSD output data as well as the decoded boxes, scores and classes

Returns

tuple containing Custom SSD output data as well as the nms filtered boxes, scores and classes

Return type

tuple(torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor, list, list, list)

training: bool¶

scaleSSD.models.custom_ssd¶

class scaleSSD.models.custom_ssd.CustomSSD(k_list=[4, 6, 6, 4], no_classes=4, out_filters=[32, 64, 512, 256])¶

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

Describes the custom ssd model architecture

Parameters

  • k_list (list[int...]) – list containing the number of anchors for each output feature map

  • no_classes (int) – the number of classes for the model to output

  • out_filters (list[int...]) – the number of filters for each output branch

forward(x)¶

Forward pass of the model. Creates the output based on the input

Parameters

x (torch.Tensor) – the input tensor to forward to the model

Returns

a tuple containing the output classification and regression Tensors

Return type

tuple[torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor]

training: bool¶
scaleSSD.models.custom_ssd.create_detection_model(anchors, no_classes, input_size)¶

Build the detection custom SSD model

Parameters

  • anchors (list) – list of anchors per fmap

  • no_classes (int) – the number of outputed classes

  • input_size (tuple(int, int)) – a tuple describing the input size of an image

Returns

a tuple containing the model layers and the bbox encoder

Return type

tuple(nn.Module, nn.Module, nn.Module), BboxEncoder

scaleSSD.models.custom_ssd.od_head_reshape(cls_branch, reg_branch, k, no_classes)¶

Reshapes object detection output feature maps so that they can be concatenated

Parameters

  • cls_branch (torch.Tensor) – the classification output branch to reshape

  • reg_branch (torch.Tensor) – the regression output branch to reshape

  • k (int) – the number of outputed anchors in the feature map

  • no_classes (int) – the number of outputed classes

Returns

a tuple containing the reshaped classification and regression Tensors

Return type

tuple[torch.Tensor, torch.Tensor]
